## Buggy Code:
```rust
#[allow(clippy::needless_collect)] fn sum_doubled(v: &[i32]) -> i32 { let doubled: Vec<i32> = v.iter().map(|x| x * 2).collect(); doubled.into_iter().sum() }
```

## Compiler Error:
clippy::needless_collect: remove the unnecessary .collect() instead of suppressing the lint

## Fixed Code:
